Data from the **ACC** can be easily downloaded from this website. The dataset can be filtered by taxonomic names or haploid/diploid counts. Multiple filters can be applied simultaneously to the database.


```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
firstup <- function(x) {
  substr(x, 1, 1) <- toupper(substr(x, 1, 1))
  x
}
library(DT)
ACC<-read.csv('ACCDB_Dec2.csv')
colnames(ACC)<-firstup(colnames(ACC))
colnames(ACC)[c(7,9,11)]<-c("Species","2N", "N")

DT::datatable(ACC[,-c(1,8,10,12,13)],rownames = F,
                  extensions = 'Buttons',
                  filter = list(position = 'top', clear = FALSE),
                  options = list(
                    dom = 'Bfrtip',
                    rownames= FALSE,
                    buttons = 
                      list(
                        list(
                          extend = 'csv',
                          filename= 'ACCDB_download',
                          buttons = c('csv'),
                          text = "Download CSV file",
                          exportOptions = list(
                            modifiers = list(page = "selected")
                          )
                        ))
                  )
)
```
